title: I wish all the soft skins on this game came to NY for a week

embed.description: Funniest Bus Argument, Man Goes In On Woman For Going Off On Bus Driver

body:
The soft skins who think people don't constantly bark at each other for every little thing irl.
The soft skins who lived in places where everyone literally does hold hands.
I wish they really came here for a bit lmao.

We slap the souls out of loud bitches and send annoying old ladies back to Jamaica
"muh irl toxic interactions lyte pls"

Welcome to the real world kiddies. This is the capital of the world too, step up.
